00035 void RAS_IRenderTools::SetClientObject(RAS_IRasterizer* rasty, void *obj)
00036 {
00037     if (m_clientobject != obj)
00038         m_clientobject = obj;
00039 }
00040 
00041 void RAS_IRenderTools::SetAuxilaryClientInfo(void* inf)
00042 {
00043     m_auxilaryClientInfo = inf;
00044 }

00046 void RAS_IRenderTools::AddLight(struct RAS_LightObject* lightobject)
00047 {
00048     m_lights.push_back(lightobject);
00049 }
00050 
00051 void RAS_IRenderTools::RemoveLight(struct RAS_LightObject* lightobject)
00052 {
00053     std::vector<struct  RAS_LightObject*>::iterator lit = 
00054         std::find(m_lights.begin(),m_lights.end(),lightobject);
00055 
00056     if (!(lit==m_lights.end()))
00057         m_lights.erase(lit);
00058 }
